#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	long int t,m,n,s;
	long int fac[]={1,1,2,6,24,120,720,5040,40320,362880,3628800,39916800,479001600};
	scanf("%ld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%ld",&m);
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		s=m+n;
		long int ans=fac[s]/(fac[m]*fac[n]);
		printf("%ld \n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
